Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Missile weapon (?)
Description: Missile weapon (?) of a semicircular shape with a groove in the lower section. Pierced with two holes in the lower section, the holes are 3 cm apart and each is located 1 cm away from the exterior edge and 1 cm from the lower edge. Crudely manufactured ceramic. Uneven and rough surfaces.
